languages.text: "Нет, {name}. Умереть всем вместе — значит позволить огню династии исчезнуть во тьме. Не так. Не сегодня".
"No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."
languages.original_text: "Нет, {name}. Умереть всем вместе — значит позволить огню династии исчезнуть во тьме. Не так. Не сегодня".

traits.locale_text: "No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."
"No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."
"No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."
"No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."
"No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."

languages.text: “不行，{name}。如果我们全都死了，王朝的烈焰就会在黑暗之中殒灭。不行，不能这样，至少今天不行。”
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."

traits.locale_text: “不行，{name}。如果我们全都死了，王朝的烈焰就会在黑暗之中殒灭。不行，不能这样，至少今天不行。”

languages.text: «No, {name}. Morir todos aquí es permitir que la llama de la dinastía se extinga en las sombras. No, no lo toleraré. Hoy no es ese día».
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."

traits.locale_text: «No, {name}. Morir todos aquí es permitir que la llama de la dinastía se extinga en las sombras. No, no lo toleraré. Hoy no es ese día».

languages.text: 「ちがうぞ、{name}。全員死ぬということは、王朝の炎が闇の中に消え去るのを許すことになる。ダメだ、そんなことがあってはならない。そんな風には終わらせない」
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."

traits.locale_text: 「ちがう、{name}。全員死ぬということは、王朝の炎が闇の中に消え去るのを許すことになる。ダメだ、そんなことがあってはならない。ともかく今日はだめだ」
「ちがうぞ、{name}。全員死ぬということは、王朝の炎が闇の中に消え去るのを許すことになる。ダメだ、そんなことがあってはならない。そんな風には終わらせない」

languages.text: « Non, {name}. En mourant tous ensemble, nous laisserions la flamme de la dynastie s'éteindre dans l'obscurité. Non, ça ne se passera pas comme ça. Pas aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."

traits.locale_text: « Non, {name}. En mourant tous ensemble, nous laisserions la flamme de la dynastie s'éteindre dans l'obscurité. Non, ça ne se passera pas comme ça. Pas aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: "Nein, {name}. Wenn wir alle sterben, lassen wir es zu, dass die Flamme der Dynastie in der Dunkelheit verlischt. Nein, so darf es nicht enden. Nicht heute."
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, {name}. Wenn wir alle sterben, lassen wir es zu, dass die Flamme der Dynastie in der Dunkelheit verlischt. Nein, so darf es nicht enden. Nicht heute."

languages.text: "Hayır {name}. Hep birlikte ölmek, hanedanlığın alevinin karanlıkta sönüp gitmesi demektir. O ateş sönmeyecek. Bugün değil."
languages.original_text: "No, {name}. To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır {name}. Hep birlikte ölmek, hanedanlığın alevinin karanlıkta sönüp gitmesi demektir. O ateş sönmeyecek. Bugün değil."

languages.original_text: "No, . To die all together is to allow the flame of the dynasty to perish in the dark. No, it will not be like this. Not today."
